ability.lookinsharp.golem.desc: Mobs hit by your sword go flying!
ability.lookinsharp.freeze.desc: Mobs hit by your sword are frozen in place!
ability.lookinsharp.slowness.desc: Mobs hit by your sword are slowed!
ability.lookinsharp.weakness.desc: Mobs hit by your sword are weakened!
ability.lookinsharp.poison.desc: Mobs hit by your sword are poisoned!
ability.lookinsharp.random.desc: Mobs hit by your sword are randomly afflicted with a potion effect, or you are afflicted with a helpful potion effect!
ability.lookinsharp.wither.desc: Mobs hit by your sword are withered!
ability.lookinsharp.life_steal.desc: You heal when you hit mobs with your sword!
